mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS ( ORDER_NO, REQUEST, PAYMENT_METHOD, PAYMENT, SHIP_STATUS, ORDER_DATE, CANCLE_STATUS, CANCLE_REASON, MEMBER_NO, SHIP_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{request}, #{paymentMethod}, #{payMent}, #{shipStatus}, #{orderDate}, #{cancleStatus}, #{cancleReason}, #{memberNo}, #{shipNo} )
